title: Emprez BI: Your new partner for the performance of your human resources
content: What is it?Emprez Business Intelligence (Emprez BI) is the brand new module proposed by Emprez to allow you to measure the performance of your human resources thanks to key performance indicators!This module allows you to have a global view of the performance of your company. You get both a general view of all your employees, but also a detailed view per employee.Here are the different data you will have access to:Worked hours that exceed the scheduled hoursAbsenteeismAuthorized absencesNon authorized absencesLate ArrivalsLate end of workshiftsMeals duration is too longBreaks duration is too longğŸ™ŒğŸ¼ The + : You'll appreciate the Emprez Index for being able to compare the performance of your human resources to structures similar to yours.Â What is it for?âœ”ï¸Â Having a more realistic view of what is happening in the field in terms of absences, lateness, overtime will allow you to adjust your management for a better performance of your teams.âœ”ï¸Â For late arrivals and absences, you will be able to identify the employees at fault and thus be able to prevent this problem.âœ”ï¸Â For hours worked in excess of the planned schedule and late shift ends you will be able to identify the cause of these overtime hours, and if they are necessarily better adapt your schedules to avoid paying employees overtime.âœ”ï¸Â Overall, Emprez BI will help you improve the performance of your teams, but not only! It will also allow you to improve the satisfaction of your employees by better distributing their workload.For whom?This module is intended for all managers who want to improve the productivity of their teams by keeping an eye on the performance of their human resources.Once the module is activated, it will be available to all Admins and Limited Admins. It will be possible to activate it for Managers and Limited Managers only upon request of an Admin.PricingEmprez offers a 2 month trial of this new module (September 8 to November 15, 2021).If you like it, contact us to subscribe for $1.50/month/employee.* Available for all manager profiles (Admin, limited admin, manager, limited manager).Only the Report-BI section is not available to the manager and limited manager profiles.Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
